document_data.caption: A map of eastern Sembia showing a portion of the Dawnpost.
document_data.name: Dawnpost
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dawnpost''' was a prominent roadway found in [[Sembia]] that connected [[Daerlun]] in the west with [[Ordulin]] in the east.
document_data.Description: Originating in Daerlun, the Dawnpost branched off northeast of the [[Way of the Manticore]], passing through the cities and towns of [[Kulta]], [[Saerb]], and [[Archenbridge]] before reaching Ordulin. The Dawnpost crossed the [[River Arkhen]] near its midway point.
